price: Ономе коме дамо дуг живот, Ми му изглед изменимо нагоре. Зар они не разумеју?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
